item.title: Setting Up Obsidian-based Digital Garden website
item.description: In looking for a simpler static site generator, I stumbled upon the following video: Publishing your Vault Online With Quartz - Brandon Boswell I found this method to have a few too many gaps in instruction to replicate his home brewed solution.
